Articles.Content:
The challenge:

(don\'t) Break Records!

The quickest trip to the dark side of the mun using Nova\'s or stock parts (Two categories will be created). Return is unnecessary, but if you can do it, it\'s the time till landing that counts for the time. Kerbin must not be visible from the ship to qualify.

The reward categories:

- International Superstar: Fastest time

- Australian Cover Band: Close, but not quite the best!

- Brain Damaged: The most ludicrous craft used.

- Wham: Terrible, derivative, Jedward avant la lettre. (Slowest posted time)
I\'m going to try this when possible!
I\'ll enter when the chance is available.
AHA! I was just listening to this awesome version when reading this xD

I\'d say one more category: fastest time where the screenshot shows a climb rate under 10 m/s, to give credit to people who don\'t just do a high-speed fly-by.

A hohmann transfer to that orbit will take about 9 hours, so I\'d say anyone slower than that is just padding their time because they like Wham.
The challenge will be to actually land

I myself was going to initiate this challenge!

I\'ll see you on the Dark Side of the Mun guys.

(Wait a minute... 'The lunatic is on the grass/launchpad...' ??? <-- ? XD)

(Wait a minute... 'The lunatic is on the grass/launchpad...' ??? <-- ? XD)

Clever!

Remebering days, and previous launches to the stars, got to keep the looners on the path...

The boosters way the giant spaceship to the floor, and every day, Jebediah adds more...

And if their ship explodes \'cos the SAS was untuned, we\'ll see them on the dark side of the Muuuuuun aahhhhhh ahhhhhhhhh...
Did this. With stock only craft. In the stupid way. Forgot to switch navball. 8)

My 2nd landing was on the dark side. Tad hard without the shadow to judge altitude, but managed.

Nova pack used.
